page_description: The article is about a cold chicken salad recipe. It is described as a versatile and healthy recipe, perfect for those days when you spend the whole day away from home and don't have time to heat up a meal. The recipe includes ingredients such as chicken breast, carrots, celery, and Greek yogurt.  The preparation steps are also listed, making it easy to follow. The article also includes nutritional information such as calories, fats, and carbohydrates.
